section_title: Certain regular servicemen not to be regarded as “members of the forces”.
section_text: 1 In section 59 of the Representation of the  People Act 1983, in subsection (1) (meaning of “member of the forces”) in paragraph (b) (exclusion of members of reserve or auxiliary forces)— a after the word “include” there shall be inserted  “                (i)              ” ; and b at the end there shall be added or                 ii a member of the regular army whose terms of service are such that, except for the purpose of training, he is required to serve only in Northern Ireland .
2 1 This Act may be cited as the Representation of the People Act 1993. 2 This Act extends to Northern Ireland.
